text: Rashed Zaman is a Bangladeshi cinematographer and cameraman. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Cinematography for the film Aynabaji (2016). ==Selected films== * Bishaash - 2010 * Monkey Mind -2010 * Dub Satar - 2011 * Desha: The Leader - (2014) * Aynabaji - 2016 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text- align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Rashed Zaman
